page.title: 03CHELMSFORD NEWS HEADLINES
page.content:
The major stories reported by local papers in Chelmsford in mid-July,1985.
{Two new Shopping Precincts}are planned for the town centre.One on the King's Head Meadow site and the other behind the eastern side of the present High Street.Such provisions exceed the Council's present Town Centre Plan.
{A man is being tried }at Norwich Crown Court, for the shotgun murder last year of the Chelmsford policeman, Acting Sergeant Brian Bishop.
{Essex county cricket club has banned} the sale of alcohol to spectators of Sunday League matches at their Chelmsford ground,after some instances of crowd rowdiness during the recent match against the Australian Touring side.
